question_text: Evaluate these statements about your career preferences:

statements.text: I prefer roles where I can work with tools and see physical results
Creative freedom is essential for my job satisfaction
I thrive on intellectual challenges and complex problem-solving
Mentoring and developing others is fulfilling to me
I enjoy taking calculated risks and driving business growth

question_text: Rate how these work values align with yours:

statements.text: I value practical solutions over theoretical concepts
Innovation and originality drive my work
Data-driven decision making is crucial to me
Building meaningful relationships at work is important
I appreciate structured processes and clear hierarchies
